column6: "When Slurks The Slime!" When a tiny jellyfish is transformed into a giant slimy blob, the Super Hero Squad have their hands full trying to keep it from engulfing all of Super Hero City!   Also, Thor reflects on his childhood--and his own gorgeous reflection in "Reflections!" And, Captain America and The Falcon team up again...for the first time! All Ages ...$2.99
column8: | penciller:Leonel Castellani | penciller:Marcelo DiChiara | writer:Todd Dezago
